name: Crystal Brawl (kcz)
description:
Description:

A quick 1v1 single screen game for two players. Shoot to damage the opponent, and then get close to push them off the arena. The more damage you deal, the further they fly.

Controls: Player 1: 

WASD for movement

left shift for shooting

left control for pushing

Player 2:

arrow keys for movement

right shift for shooting

right control for pushing

Escape to pause.
